method.name: change_clip
method.description: Changes to a specific clip within the playlist (by index). Sends an error to the console if [param clip_index] is out of bounds.

method.name: get_current_clip_index
method.description: Get the currently playing audio clip index.

method.name: next_clip
method.description: Play the next clip. The next random clip is played if [member AudioStreamPlaylist.shuffle] is enabled. If [member AudioStreamPlaylist.loop] is disabled and is the last already, nothing will happen.

method.name: previous_clip
method.description: Play the previous clip. The previous random clip is played if [member AudioStreamPlaylist.shuffle] is enabled. If [member AudioStreamPlaylist.loop] is disabled and is the first already, nothing will happen.
